#include <iostream>
 
using namespace std;
 
 
void palindrome(int x, int i){
	int dig=x;
	
	if (x/10 == 0) {
		cout << i <<" " << x << endl;
		return;
	}
	int xy=0;
	while(x/10 > 0){
			xy = 10*(x%10+ xy);
			x=x/10;
		}
	xy = xy+ x;
 
	
	if (xy +dig !=2*dig){
		i++;
		palindrome(xy+dig, i);
	}else{
		cout << i << " " << xy << endl;
		return;
	}	
	
}
 
int main() {
	
	int test, num;
	cin >> test;
	for (int i=0; i<test; i++){
		cin >> num;
		palindrome(num, 0);
	}
	
	
	return 0;
}
